SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
replace into sys_percent ( client, enable, odv_low, odv_basic, odv_reward, odv_remark, manage_reward, manage_remark ) values
( #{reddemCode.client}, #{reddemCode.enable}, #{reddemCode.odvLow}, #{reddemCode.odvBasic}, #{reddemCode.odvReward}, #{reddemCode.odvRemark}, #{reddemCode.manageReward}, #{reddemCode.manageRemark} )
mapper.select: select t.id,d.id as client,t.enable,t.odv_low as odvLow,t.odv_basic as odvBasic,t.odv_reward as odvReward,t.odv_remark as odvRemark,t.manage_reward as manageReward,t.manage_remark as manageRemark from sys_percent t right JOIN (select id,name from sys_data_dictionary where dictionary_id = 5 and delete_flag=0) d on t.client = d.id
